body_html:
I would not use tf.add_check_numerics_ops in this case, since it doesn't know what are the hidden nodes that shouldn't be checked.

Add tf.check_numerics to the node that you want to check it yourself.
body_text:
I would not use tf.add_check_numerics_ops in this case, since it doesn't know what are the hidden nodes that shouldn't be checked.
Add tf.check_numerics to the node that you want to check it yourself.
body:
I would not use tf.add_check_numerics_ops in this case, since it doesn't know what are the hidden nodes that shouldn't be checked. 

Add tf.check_numerics to the node that you want to check it yourself.
